name: Moustafa Dabah
bio: As an Information Security specialist, I lead a skilled technical team delivering end-to-end solutions across product engineering, web and mobile development, infrastructure, and data systems. We build secure, reliable systems from the ground up and enhance existing platforms for companies of all sizes. Our experience also includes responsibly identifying and reporting real issues to major global platforms such as Google (YouTube), Facebook, Twitter, Carrefour, Quora, and others
